arts.ttl: Frustrating goals given away, two new signings done and more to come and half-term thoughts, Cheltenham Town boss Michael Flynn after Notts County defeat
arts.sum: We were really good second half and you take the poor goals we've given them out of it, they are a good team and they don't need any help. You look at it, we have given them the points today, but that's not taking anything away from them because they do play some really good football.

arts.ttl: Cardiff CIty loan star Joel Colwill on his Cheltenham Town future, Boxing Day double and Michael Flynn's management
arts.sum: Joel Colwill has revealed he would be happy to remain at Cheltenham Town for the rest of the season after firing his loan team to a Boxing Day triumph. "I haven't heard anything (from Cardiff), so I am just playing football every day, coming in and giving my all."

arts.ttl: Preview: Cheltenham Town vs. Notts County - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Sunday's League Two clash between Cheltenham Town and Notts County, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
